summary: An Ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, extending and establishing of Fifteenth Avenue Southwest, from the south line of Highland Heights Addition to West Seattle (now City of Seattle) to the north line of E. S. Young's Addition to West Seattle (now City of Seattle), all in the City of Seattle; and providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and providing that the payment for such improvement be made by special assessment upon property specially benefited, in the manner provided by law.
